full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,BSHES GNYEN BSTEN TSUL GYI MI MTHUN PHYOGS GTZO BOR NGO SHES PA'I SGO NAS BSNGO SMON DANG BCAS GSOL BA 'DEBS TSUL SNYING GI MUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,CES BSHES GNYEN BSTEN TSUL GYI MI MTHUN PHYOGS GTZO BOR NGO SHES PA'I SGO NAS BSNGO SMON DANG BCAS GSOL BA 'DEBS TSUL SNYING GI MUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG SKAL BZANG SOGS SLOB MA KHA SHAS KYIS NGAG 'DON DU BYAS CHOG PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BAR BRTEN, ,BLA GZUGS BSTAN MING GYIS BSKYAR BZLOS TSUL DU DU BRIS PA'O, ,DE YANG, ,DMIGS BSAL RANG GANG MOS KYI RTZA BA'I BLA MA'I MTSAN BCUG DGOS TSE, ,MJUG GI MING SPEL GYI MTSAMS 'DIR BCUG NA'ANG RUNG NGO, ,'DIS KYANG GZUR GNAS RNAMS KYIS GZHUNG CHEN MO RNAMS RANG GI BYAD BZHIN GYI NAG NOG ME LONG LA BLTA BA'I TSUL DU LEGS PAR BLTA ZHING GSUNG RAB MA LUS GDAMS PAR 'CHAR BA DANG, BLA MA SANGS RGYAS KYI BYIN RLABS MTHA' DAG MYUR DU RGYUD LA 'JUG PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,
